name: Wingman (ColeChurchkid)
description: Wingman is 2D puzzle platformer that lets you take control of a space marine named armed with a high tech booster back that allows the wearer to reach great heights and fire plasma balls that haven't been able to be replicated yet. In this game you must work your way out of a crashed ship and leave the planet you are trapped on while avoid enemies and using your limited resources such as jumps and shots wisely.
